pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, August 23, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Biarritz, France.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.

Biarritz, France

9:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Biarritz, France.

Biarritz Pays Basque Airport
7, esplanade de lâ€™Europe
